Author: beldexjohn
Title: BELDEX - Cryptocurrecny Exchange | Crypto Trading Platform
Body: Beldex is planning for a major technology update, for that we are performing blockchain swap.  Following to this, we have stopped the deposits and withdrawals in exchanges. Please do not deposit funds in exchanges till we complete the swap. Any funds which are being deposited in the exchange after 16th January 2019 will be treated as invalid. Beldex will not be responsible for any such loss.  Miners are requested to stop mining until we complete the swap, do move your funds to our official Beldex wallet on or before 18th January 2019 to avoid any loss during the blockchain swap.  The funds which are already in the exchanges (BTC-Alpha, BiteBTC & STEX) will be safe.  We are expected to complete the swap by 23rd January 2019 23:59 HKT. Changes related to the swap will be informed by us with our next newsletter in advance.  ---- Team - BELDEX

Author: beldexjohn
Title: BELDEX - Cryptocurrecny Exchange | Crypto Trading Platform
Body: Dear Beldians,  As mentioned in the previous newsletter, here is an update on the Blockchain swap.  We would like to inform you that we are expecting a slight delay on the swap due to the sensitive update. Our relationship is extremely important to us and we have equipped our team and trying our best to minimize the delay as much as possible.  During this swap, please do not deposit funds in exchanges till we complete, the swap is expected to complete by 25th January 2019 23:59 HKT.  We sincerely apologize to you for the delay and Thank you for your patience and understanding.  Thanks & Regards, Team - BELDEX COIN LTD.

Author: novichok here
Title: BELDEX - Cryptocurrecny Exchange | Crypto Trading Platform
Body: Beldex coin situation. Today, January 15, 2019 there was a following post on Beldex telegram channel:  Beldex is planning for a major technology update, for that we are performing blockchain swap. Following to this, we have stopped the deposits and withdrawals in exchanges. Please do not deposit funds in exchanges till we complete the swap. Any funds which are being deposited in the exchange after 16th January 2019 will be treated as invalid. Beldex will not be responsible for any such loss. Miners are requested to stop mining until we complete the swap, do move your funds to our official Beldex wallet on or before 18th January 2019 to avoid any loss during the blockchain swap. The funds which are already in the exchanges (BTC-Alpha, BiteBTC & STEX) will be safe. We are expected to complete the swap by 23rd January 2019 23:59 HKT. Changes related to the swap will be informed by us with our next newsletter in advance. ---- Team - BELDEX  This is the second time in 2 months they have done this with no prior warning whatsoever. We can only guess they keep swapping blockchains to award more coins to themselves, as they have done so last time they introduced new blockchain:  Miner reward transaction: dd2fe74a9e81c5303023fa92ca0a4338cd535fb405f2d09fa8a43e40c0abc2ec 108727914.840331 0.1211 1 The above transaction issues 108 million BDX (all other block rewards in current blockchain are about 3 BDX). We have stopped the pool completely and paid out all outstanding balances. If you have BDX outside the exchange, we suggest you move it to the web wallet, where at least you have a chance of retaining coins after so-called "technology upgrade". Beldex team has promised to restore balances from the blockchain after the last time and even created a google form for such requests, but to this day nobody received any coins. They only restored web wallets and partially exchanges.  It appears BeldexCoin is a poorly executed scam.  fairhash.org team

Author: beldexjohn
Title: BELDEX - Cryptocurrecny Exchange | Crypto Trading Platform
Body: on 31st December and 14th January we have faced issues because of unethical miners who didn't keep the network integrity. We were planned for a hardfork but unfortunately due to lack of time forced us to do the blockchain swap. The beldex team guarentees no coin loss during this swap.  We are again requesting beldex holders to transfer the balance from your core wallet to the beldex official web wallet.  Regarding the GUI desktop wallet, our team is currently working on it and will be released on first week of March 2019  Team - BELDEX.

Author: beldexjohn
Title: BELDEX - Cryptocurrecny Exchange | Crypto Trading Platform
Body: BELDEX, a new cryptocurrency ecosystem has emerged with the sole purpose of resolving some of the key issues faced by the crypto world like privacy, liquidity, and usability.  Specifications:  Algorithm           :   Cryptonote Block Rewarded   :   100 Block Time   :   2 Minutes Total Coins   :   1.5 Billion  Beldex: https://beldex.io/  BELDEX has launched a privacy coin that ensures privacy, security, untraceability and fungibility. Some of the common advantages that BELDEX offers to its customers are as follows:  Fraud Protection: BELDEX coins are digital and cannot be counterfeited or reversed arbitrarily by the sender or receiver.  Identity Theft: Credit cards operate on a ‚Äúpull‚Äù basis, where the store initiates the payment and pulls the designated amount from the account. Whereas, BELDEX coin uses a ‚Äúpush‚Äù mechanism that allows the cryptocurrency holder to send the exact amount to the merchant or recipient with no further information.  Immediate Settlement: Purchasing real property involves a number of third parties, delays, and payment of fees. Smart contracts can be designed and enforced to eliminate or add third party approvals, reference external facts. It can also be used to complete at a future date or time for a fraction of the expense and time required to complete traditional asset transfers.  Globally Recognized: BEDLEX coins are globally recognized and so it can be spent anywhere in the world on a daily basis. The inclusion of a utility debit card ensures the aforementioned point and thus provides high liquidity.  Lower Fees: BELDEX coins can be exchanged at a very low transaction fee and when transacted using BELDEX exchange, users are given special compensation on their transaction fee. This service acts like Paypal does for cash or credit card users, providing the online exchange system for bitcoin, and as such, they‚Äôre likely to charge fees.  Untraceable: BELDEX coins cannot be traced back due to encryption. This is achieved by masking the sender and receiver addresses. With the usage of RingXT coin algorithm, BELDEX ensures ‚Äústealth‚Äù mode during the transactions.  Follow us on : Telegram Channel: https://t.me/beldexcoin Twitter: https://twitter.com/BeldexCoin Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/beldexofficial Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/beldexcoin/?hl=en LinkedIn: https://in.linkedin.com/company/beldex-coin Medium: https://medium.com/@beldexcoin Steemit: https://steemit.com/@beldexadmin/ GitHub: https://github.com/beldex-coin/beldex
